selected_skills.name: interpret_diagram_for_geometry
selected_skills.purpose: To extract and interpret geometric information from the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash to extract angle measures and relationships from the diagram.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To perform calculations on the extracted angle measures.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use to calculate the measure of angle EOB based on the extracted information.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer in the required format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use to format the calculated angle measure as one of the multiple-choice options.
